meanings.sent1: The narrater read the story aloud to the class.
meanings.sent2: The narrater captivated the audience with their storytelling.
meanings.sent3: The narrater joked that the characters in the story were talking to them.
meanings.sent4: The narrater's voice painted a vivid picture of the tale.
meanings.sent5: The narrater's expressive tone made the story come alive.

meanings.definition: The person who tells a story.
meanings.sent1: Every good book has a talented narrater who brings the characters to life.
meanings.sent2: The narrater skillfully weaved together different plotlines in the story.
meanings.sent3: The narrater playfully added sound effects to enhance the storytelling experience.
meanings.sent4: The narrater's words danced in the air, enchanting the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The narrater's engaging style made the audience hang on every word.
